cab.content: From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,22nd November 1919.(Received 24th.)Priority A.15735. Malleson telegraphs, 20th November, that the few Bolshevik desertersarriving Bajgiran give the following information :-- (a) Flour very short; (6) Bolsheviksincreasingly distrustful of Afghan designs; (c) Bolsheviks determined to captureKrasnovodsk as soon as possible and then to raise trouble in Persia. Mallesonrepeated above to Constantinople, Tehran and Kasvin.
